BasicInfo.short: Cluster Labs is a mobile application that allows its users to create albums and share photos with friends and family members.

Products.name: Screenshotter
Products.description: Screenshotter is a smartphone application that enables users to organize and manage their iPhone screenshots.

Products.name: Tripcast
Products.description: A living travel journal for your friends back home

Products.name: LaunchKit
Products.description: Simple, useful tools for mobile makers.

Products.name: Sketch to App Store
Products.description: Generate App Store images for all iPhone sizes from Sketch.

Products.name: Homeroom
Products.description: Homeroom is an online platform that enables teachers to share what’s happening in their classroom with students’ parents.
